options.name: short
options.description: Give the output in the short-format

options.name: branch
options.description: Show the branch and tracking info even in short-format

options.name: porcelain
options.description: Give the output in an easy-to-parse format for scripts

subcommand.name: add
subcommand.description: Add file contents to the index

options.name: all
options.description: Add all files in the entire working tree

options.name: update
options.description: Update the index just where it already has an entry matching pathspec

options.name: patch
options.description: Interactively choose hunks of patch between the index and the work tree

positional_args.name: pathspec
positional_args.description: Files to add to the index

options.name: message
options.description: Use the given message as the commit message

options.name: all
options.description: Automatically stage files that have been modified and deleted

options.name: amend
options.description: Replace the tip of the current branch by creating a new commit

subcommand.name: push
subcommand.description: Update remote refs along with associated objects

options.name: set-upstream
options.description: Set up tracking information for the current branch

options.name: force
options.description: Usually, the command refuses to update a remote ref that is not an ancestor

options.name: all
options.description: Push all branches

positional_args.name: refspec
positional_args.description: Specify what destination ref to update with what source object

subcommand.name: pull
subcommand.description: Fetch from and integrate with another repository or a local branch

options.name: rebase
options.description: Rebase the current branch on top of the upstream branch after fetching

options.name: no-rebase
options.description: Override earlier --rebase

positional_args.name: refspec
positional_args.description: The refs to fetch and how the local refs are updated

subcommand.name: fetch
subcommand.description: Download objects and refs from another repository

options.name: all
options.description: Fetch all remotes

options.name: prune
options.description: Remove any remote-tracking references that no longer exist on the remote

options.name: oneline
options.description: Shorthand for '--pretty=oneline --abbrev-commit'

options.name: graph
options.description: Draw a text-based graphical representation of the commit history

options.name: max-count
options.description: Limit the number of commits to output

positional_args.name: revision-range
positional_args.description: Show only commits in the specified revision range

subcommand.name: diff
subcommand.description: Show changes between commits, commit and working tree, etc

options.name: cached
options.description: Show the changes staged for the next commit relative to the named tree-ish

options.name: name-only
options.description: Show only names of changed files

options.name: stat
options.description: Generate a diffstat

options.name: all
options.description: List both remote-tracking branches and local branches

options.name: remote
options.description: List or delete (if used with -d) the remote-tracking branches

options.name: delete
options.description: Delete a branch

positional_args.name: branchname
positional_args.description: The name of the branch to create or delete

subcommand.name: checkout
subcommand.description: Switch branches or restore working tree files

options.name: branch
options.description: Create and checkout a new branch

options.name: track
options.description: Set up tracking information

positional_args.name: branch-or-paths
positional_args.description: The branch to check out or paths to checkout from index
